name: firelomo
description: Quickly send page content to Flomo

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-ts && npm run copy-files && npm run browserify
scripts.real-publish: web-ext build --overwrite-dest --ignore-files src/ scripts/ README.md package-lock.json package.json tsconfig.json
scripts.real-sign: web-ext sign --ignore-files src/ scripts/ README.md package-lock.json package.json tsconfig.json
scripts.publish: npm run clean-artifacts && npm run real-publish
scripts.sign: npm run clean-artifacts && npm run real-sign

author: 7sDream <firefox@7sdre.am>
